document_notes.text:
This update for ffmpeg fixes the following issues:
  
- CVE-2020-22027: Fixed heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exits in deflate16 at libavfilter/vf_neighbor.c (bsc#1186607)
- CVE-2021-38291: Fixed an assertion failure at src/libavutil/mathematics.c (bsc#1189428)
- CVE-2023-51798: Fixed floating point exception(FPE) via the interpolate function (bsc#1223304)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exits in FFmpeg 4.2 in deflate16 at libavfilter/vf_neighbor.c, which might lead to memory corruption and other potential consequences.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.text: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Ffmpeg v.N113007-g8d24a28d06 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code via a floating point exception (FPE) error at libavfilter/vf_minterpolate.c:1078:60 in interpolate.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
